VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become a parent
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to become a parent and have a child of their own.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become a grandparent
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to become a grandparent and have a grandchild.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: form a psychic bond
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to psychically bond with a perfect partner.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become a sanguophage
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to live forever as a sanguophage.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become a mechanitor
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to control the march of the machines.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become a psycaster
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to become acquainted with the psychic powers of psycasters.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: link with anima tree
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to undergo an anima tree linking ritual with them as the main recipient of the boons.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: hear anima scream
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to hear the screams of a dying anima tree.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become noble
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to join the imperial great hierarchy.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: wield bladelink weapon
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to bond with a bladelink weapon.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} psychically bonds with a bladelink weapon.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: attend an inspirational throne speech
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to be there when an inspirational speech is given.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become an ideological figure
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to become a meaningful figure in their ideology.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} gains any role in their ideology - leader, moralist, specialist.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become a leader
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to lead their people from a position of power.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: connect with a gauranlen tree
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would love to connect with a Gauranlen tree in a tree linking ceremony.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} connects to a Gauranlen tree via tree linking ceremony.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get married
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to get married.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: propose
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to propose to somebody.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get some lovin'
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to get some lovinâ€™.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: consume luciferium
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to ride the luciferium high.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: consume human meat
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to see what long pig tastes like.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: overdose
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to see what itâ€™s like to overdose.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get blackout drunk
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get absolutely shitfaced.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get a beautiful lover
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to be told that they are punching above their weight, and become lovers with a beautiful person.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} becomes lovers with a pawn with a Beauty stat of 1 or higher.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: grow old
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to live long enough to see a different person in the mirror.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} gets birthday event/becomes 65, whichever comes first.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get joywired
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to feel the effects of joywire.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get bionic spine
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would love to have a bionic spine.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get inspiration
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} aspires to be inspired.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: create a legendary work
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to leave their mark on the world and create a legendary work.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} creates any legendary object - weapon, armor, sculpture, furniture, anything.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: obtain legendary gear
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to feel the work of a legendary master in their grasp.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} equips a legendary weapon or wears legendary apparel of any kind.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: bond with an animal
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to bond with an animal companion.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become rich
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants their colony to prosper and become excessively rich.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: kill someone
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to inflict pain and kill another being.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become liked
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to be liked by many of their peers.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} has 10 people with positive opinion about them.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become disliked
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to be hated by many of their peers.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} has 10 people with negative opinion about them.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: feel catharsis
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to unbottle their feelings and feel the serenity afterwards.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: defeat faction leader
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to be the one to defeat an enemy faction leader.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: have a wonderful room
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to have the most wonderful bedroom.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: see an aurora
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to skygaze during an aurora.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: complete machine body
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to have 6 different artificial body parts.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: dead rival
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to have a rival, and for them to die.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: gain a level five psycast
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to gain access to a psycast of the fifth level.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: burn some luciferium
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get rid of some disgusting luciferium in a crematorium or fireplace.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: experience resurrection
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to experience true death and be resurrected using a mech serum.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get rid of asthma
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get rid of asthma.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get rid of cataracts
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get rid of cataracts.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get rid of hearing loss
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get rid of hearing loss.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get five burn scars
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get five burn scars.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: achieve excruciating pain
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to achieve an exquisite, excruciating pain.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get ultimate revenge on a Centipede
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to shred a Centipede blaster to show him who's boss now.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: witness flesh shaping
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to see another person use the flesh shaping ability.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: become inhuman
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to be dominated by the psychic patterns of the void and become inhuman.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get a tentacle
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get a warped body.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: get digested
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to get digested whole. {0} swears this is not a kink thing.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: play with a golden cube
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to play with a golden cube.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: read a fascinating tome
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to read a fascinating eldritch tome.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: held a concert
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to hold a concert for other colonists.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: destroy a mech cluster
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to completely destroy a mech cluster.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: destroy an insect hive
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to completely destroy an insect hive.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: use a flame weapon
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to use a flame weapon in combat.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: read an amazing book
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to read a book detailing a skill on which they are passionate about.
